name: KickUp
description:
KickUp partners with K-12 organizations to coordinate professional learning efforts, improve decision-making and ensure that great ideas translate into demonstrable outcomes in the classroom.

‚ÄúThe great thing about KickUp is they brought credibility to the professional development work we are doing. It‚Äôs challenging to be a ‚Äòprophet in our own land‚Äô, but having KickUp‚Äôs professional reports presented in clear and compelling ways instantly became a communication tool between our entire curriculum department, the district cabinet, and the school board. I was able to use the resources KickUp created for a board report and now the district is interested in seeing how all of the other departments can benefit from their services. We are in need of someone who can take that step back and see the big picture of what we are trying to accomplish with professional development, effective student learning, and assessment and tie it all together for us in ways that make sense. KickUp has become the connector between departments, helping to lead us all in our common goal, to improve learning for our students.

# Every school district needs more great teachers.
Create them with KickUp, the most user-friendly and data-rich platform that streamlines all aspects of developing educators.
  * Professional learning management
  * Educator evaluation
  * Coaching, mentoring, and PLCs
  * Walkthroughs

[Schedule a demo](http://www.kickup.co/</schedule-a-demo>)
[Watch the 1-minute explainer üëá![KickUp video title card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622bb9732bf7e3e26273133c_home.jpeg)](http://www.kickup.co/<#>)
### We work with
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622a52061a4b3c3e3abb5d72_Ryan-Neal-Camdenton.jpeg)
##### Assistant Superintendents
Monitor and drive strategic alignment across teams and educators
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</users#assistant-superintendents>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622a54ab1a4b3c5dd6bb7a05_Hanna-Schramm.jpeg)
##### Directors of PD
Get the information you need to personalize professional learning for your teachers
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</users#directors-of-pd>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/62d8c48f2a634d99502f6ab1_KickUp-Client-Evelyn-Gilliam.jpg)
##### District Leaders
Monitor the implementation of key initiatives and track the effectiveness of PD
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</users#district-leaders>)
Products
### What we do
KickUp offers three software products purpose-built for modern school districts:
[Schedule a demo](http://www.kickup.co/</schedule-a-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622b8423be2bfd333d2f39f8_nav-icon-coaching.svg)
##### KickUp Foundations
Improve educator practice and unlock insights about the effectiveness of your supports by bringing data from learning walks, coaching cycles, and needs assessments into one hub.
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</foundations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622b8422e6ce8b9b5ebb2718_nav-icon-books.svg)
##### KickUp Learning
Build educator engagement and effectiveness by connecting all of your online and offline PD to one, simple, source of truth.
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</learning>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622b84226c920e823b1a4e90_nav-icon-growth.svg)
##### KickUp Growth
Move performance evaluation from compliance to growth, and invest educators in a cycle of continuous improvement.
[Learn more](http://www.kickup.co/</growth>)
Trusted by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622fa886d73b29f0719f7242_stvrain-logo-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622fa886f6887d3c9789d74a_atlantapublicschools-logo-color.svg)![Lubbock Independent School District Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/628fca568315b65efa967f53_KickUp-Client-Logo-Lubbock-Color.svg)![Winston-Salem Forsyth County Public Schools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/6290227e20f96c6a5e3ab2df_KickUp-Client-Logo-Winston-Salem-Color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622fa8851b98be5e13e8d8f7_schooldistrictphiladelphia-logo-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622fa886d45c47168e4671c4_kippmemphis-logo-color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622fa885b01ae15e20fa86fc_coronanorco-logo-color.svg)![Richmond Public Schools Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/6290227e72aeeec7db1bc96b_KickUp-Client-Logo-Richmond-Public-Schools-Color.svg)
Proud to partner with
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaae0b49b7f918b6c6b2_diane%20sweeney-partner-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaae102593972d611648_vlla-partner-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaaee203bfe860b4c229_learning%20fwd-partner-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaae70ad180189698743_quality%20matters-partner-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaaee6dab2344d7c7971_mcrel-partner-logo-white.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d407b4e0bbf708bfc429d/622faaae0b49b73571b6c6ad_danielson-partner-logo-white.svg)

generated_description:
KickUp is a Philly-based education tech company that's making waves by streamlining professional development for K-12 organizations. While much of their mission details remain under wraps, their initial premise is clear: they're all about improving professional learning efforts in education. Their approach focuses on harnessing data and insights to drive real outcomes in the classroom, helping educators enhance their skills and effectiveness.

What sets KickUp apart? The testimonials say it all. Educators have highlighted how useful KickUp‚Äôs professional reports are for communicating critical information across various departmental levels‚Äîfrom curriculum teams to district cabinets and even school boards. This kind of clear communication is crucial when you‚Äôre trying to align everyone towards a common goal of boosting student learning.

Founded as part of Y Combinator's Batch IK12, KickUp has a small but mighty team of nine. They‚Äôre based in Philadelphia, a city with a rich educational landscape. Their offerings are tailored to the needs of schools, featuring three distinct products:

1. **KickUp Foundations**: This tool bridges data from various professional learning activities‚Äîlike coaching cycles and learning walks‚Äîinto a single hub, providing educators with insights to improve their practice.

2. **KickUp Learning**: It connects all forms of professional development, both online and offline, allowing for a consolidated view of educator engagement and effectiveness.

3. **KickUp Growth**: Here, performance evaluations shift from merely a compliance-driven process to a growth-centric one, promoting continuous improvement among educators.

They work closely with assistant superintendents, directors of professional development, and district leaders, illustrating KickUp‚Äôs role as a vital connector within educational institutions. Their platform focuses on data-rich experiences that help make professional learning management straightforward and effective.

Further fun facts about KickUp: they‚Äôre proud to partner with various school districts, showing a steady uptick in interest as more departments recognize the value of their services.

For those interested in experiencing what KickUp can do for their district, scheduling a demo is just a click away, making it easy to see their tools in action.

Website: [KickUp](http://www.kickup.co)

In short, KickUp is on a mission to turn the often-overlooked professional development in education into a streamlined, impactful process‚Äîhelping to create great teachers and, ultimately, better student outcomes. If that sounds like something your district could use, you might want to take them for a spin!
